sentences.sentence: The system will archive the information so agencies can review it in detail.
sentences.translation: 该系统会将该信息存档，以便各代理机构能对其详细审阅。

sentences.sentence: A quarter of this vast archive has been indexed and made accessible to researchers.
sentences.translation: 这批数量巨大的档案的1/4都已编了索引，可供研究者查阅。

sentences.sentence: One additional service not discussed so far is the ability to archive and prune old instances that may no longer be required.
sentences.translation: 到目前为止尚未讨论的另一个服务，是存档和删除可能不再需要的旧实例的功能。
